articles.title: Top US envoy Rubio to meet Russian officials in Saudi Arabia for Ukraine peace talks - BBC.com
articles.description: US officials say direct talks with Russia - the first such talks since its invasion of Ukraine - will not involve Kyiv's European allies.
articles.content:
US Secretary of State Marco Rubio plans to meet Russian officials in Saudi Arabia in the coming days for talks aimed at ending the war in Ukraine, US officials say.

articles.author: Thomas Latschan
articles.title: Fundamental rift between US and EU opens up in Munich - DW (English)
articles.description: At the Munich Security Conference, the "shared values" so frequently invoked by Europeans were called into question by US Vice President JD Vance. So do the US and Europe still speak the same language?
articles.content: Silence fell and the tension in the room was almost palpable as US Vice President JD Vance walked to the podium at the Munich Security Conference. Just 48 hours earlier, the world had felt like a dif… [+7398 chars]

articles.title: Zelenskyy calls for 'armed forces of Europe' as EU leaders bristle at new US policies on Ukraine - The Associated Press
